Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily life significantly. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this fantastic opportunity to elevate your experience. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
